description:
Zoro and Luffy go head-to-head with Mother Nature, and Sanji`s rescue mission is bolstered by Franky`s allegiance – and the arrival of the mysterious Sniper King!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Nami o Kudake! Luffy to Zoro no Saikyou Combo
Rubber e Zoro contro la grande onda
Smash the Wave! Luffy and Zoro Use the Strongest Combo!
Une brèche dans la vague ! Le combo ultime : Luffy et Zoro
Сквозь волны! Могучее комбо Луффи и Зоро
اسحقوا الموجة! هجوم لوفي وزورو الثّنائيّ الأقوى
波を砕け! ルフィとゾロの最強合体技[コンボ]
